reviewText: I bought this for my grandson. He is 20 months and loves the animals
My little one enjoys watching these! They are great. This arrived on time and in great condition. Thank you!

We LOVE Baby Genius, and this DVD is no exception!  The music is soothing - and the kids love watching the animals!

We first purchased this DVD when taking out kids on their first road trip - they were completely engaged.  We feel great knowing that our kids are watching something enjoyable, while at the same time educational.

I recommend Baby Genius to all of our family and friends with small children!

Excellent price - Amazon provides you with a wonderful deal.
Not as good as the other DVDs. My 17-month old son gets bored with it easily where he can't stop watching the other ones we own.
